BOT_TOKEN.description: Your telegram bot token, get from @Botfather in telegram.

API_ID.description: Get API_ID from my.telegram.org, used for pyrogram base.

API_HASH.description: Get API_HASH from my.telegram.org, used for pyrogram base.

OWNER_ID.description: Your user ID as an integer.

SUDO.description: A space-separated list of user IDs who you want to assign as sudo users.

DB_CHANNEL.description: Database channel where you will store files

REQ_FSUB.description: Space seprated values of chat id. It will create join request.

FSUB_CHANNEL.description: Space seprated values of chat id
